scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:theme" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:marketing" "npm run start:dafne"  "npm run start:neighborhood"  "npm run start:container"
scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run serve:theme" "npm run serve:auth" "npm run serve:marketing" "npm run serve:dafne"  "npm run serve:neighborhood"  "npm run serve:container"
scripts.start:container: cd container && npm i && npm start
scripts.start:auth: cd auth  && npm i && npm start
scripts.start:marketing: cd marketing  && npm i && npm start
scripts.start:dafne: cd dafne  && npm i && npm start
scripts.start:theme: cd theme  && npm i && npm start
scripts.start:neighborhood: cd neighborhood  && npm i && npm start
scripts.serve:container: cd container && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.serve:auth: cd auth  && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.serve:marketing: cd marketing   && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.serve:dafne: cd dafne  && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.serve:theme: cd theme   && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.serve:neighborhood: cd neighborhood   && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.stop: concurrently "npm run stop:container" "npm run stop:auth" "npm run stop:marketing" "npm run stop:dafne"
